geminiBrandBrief.brandDescription: Crystal Energy is an online retailer offering a wide selection of authentic, high-quality crystals, gemstones, and related metaphysical products, aiming to promote holistic well-being and spiritual exploration.
geminiBrandBrief.brandAudience: Individuals seeking natural wellness solutions, crystal enthusiasts, spiritual seekers, and those interested in personal growth and energy healing.
geminiBrandBrief.brandMessage: Unlock your potential and enhance your life through the natural healing power of authentic crystals.

aboutUs.paragraph1: At Crystal Energy, we are dedicated to bringing you high-quality, authentic crystals that harness the earth's natural energies for your well-being.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our best-selling tumbled stones, chosen for their vibrant energy and smooth finish, perfectly embody our commitment to providing accessible and powerful crystal experiences.
aboutUs.paragraph3: That all ties into our mission to empower individuals to connect with the healing properties of crystals, fostering personal growth and spiritual balance in their everyday lives.

deliverabilitySnippet: Order Number – Thank you for choosing Crystal Energy. Your items are being prepared and will be dispatched shortly. Keep this message for reference. We're ready to help. 1. **Processing**: Typical timing is 1–2 business days. At high volume, allow 3–5. This is before transit. 2. **Shipping & Arrival**: Standard delivery may apply to qualifying baskets. Expedited options may show at checkout. Timing depends on method and region. 3. **Payment & Security**: Transactions encrypted. Details protected. Payment methods shown at checkout. 4. **Returns & Resolution**: Contact us within 7 days if item is damaged or incorrect. Instructions will follow.
